name: One build to rule them all
author: stephenratcliffe809

posts.author: stephenratcliffe809
posts.content:
Well, WoG anyway. Just some fun away from the forum agreement in the other place not to talk about this.

So here's the game - post one Epic build that you know / hope can gather solo as many of the rod parts possible maybe even see off Secret Pants themself.

And a few words why.

Rules? How about:

* No assumption of a perma-haste item
* Equipment that is common loot / Boss drop OK
* You have access to crafted wands

Let the game begin!

Sent from my SM-T810 using Tapatalk

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
I'm hardly an authority here, I haven't found a single rod part yet!
